items.sentence: Tom told me he thought that Mary was the last one to do that.
Tom told me he thought that Mary might be tempted to do that.
Tom told me he thought that Mary didn't want to go to Boston.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary could probably do that.
Tom told me he never thought that he'd be able to walk again.
Tom wouldn't have been able to do that if Mary hadn't helped.
Tom isn't the only one who thinks it's a bad idea to do that.
If you're driving to Boston next weekend, could I get a ride?
A group of about 40 counterprotesters showed up to the rally.
What makes you think that everyone is conspiring against you?
